entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is described as having unruly hair that grows all over the place. He is also mentioned to be frying eggs in the kitchen.

entities.name: dudley
entities.description: Dudley is described as looking like Uncle Vernon with a large pink face, small watery blue eyes and thick blond hair that lies smoothly on his head. He is also mentioned to be counting his presents.

entities.name: uncle vernon
entities.description: Uncle Vernon is described as having a similar appearance to Dudley with a large pink face and small watery blue eyes.

entities.name: aunt petunia
entities.description: Aunt Petunia is mentioned to have said that Dudley looks like a baby angel.

entities.name: marge
entities.description: Marge is mentioned as the aunt who gave a present to Dudley.

relationships.description: Aunt Petunia said that Dudley looks like a baby angel.
Harry often made fun of Dudley saying he looked like a pig in a wig.
